TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCTextureAtlas extends System.Object

Docs.summary: <para>A class that implements a Texture Atlas. Supported features: The atlas file can be a PVRTC, PNG or any other format supported by <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTexture2D" /> Quads can be updated in runtime Quads can be added in runtime Quads can be removed in runtime Quads can be re-ordered in runtime The <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTextureAtlas" /> capacity can be increased or decreased in runtime OpenGL component: V3F, C4B, T2F. The quads are rendered using an OpenGL ES VBO. To render the quads using an interleaved vertex array list, you should modify the <ref refid="cc_config_8h" kindref="compound">ccConfig.h</ref> file. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTexture2D" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTextureAtlas" /><ref refid="cc_config_8h" kindref="compound">ccConfig.h</ref>

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ResizeCapacity (int newCapacity);
.method public hidebysig instance bool ResizeCapacity(int32 newCapacity) cil managed

Docs.summary: resize the capacity of the . The new capacity can be lower or higher than the current one It returns YES if the resize was successful. If it fails to resize the capacity it will return NO with a new capacity of 0.
Docs.remarks: <para>resize the capacity of the <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTextureAtlas" />. The new capacity can be lower or higher than the current one It returns YES if the resize was successful. If it fails to resize the capacity it will return NO with a new capacity of 0. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCTextureAtlas" />
